Lol, the comments. I can't understand how people are getting triggered by fictional works.

tl;dr
This is not actually cuckoldry. Proclaiming 'death to cucks' in this situation is hatred of the victim.

All this upset is caused by misunderstanding what NTR is.
NTR is specifically 'netorare', which is when the story is from the perspective of the guy getting cheated on.
This is netori, like the guy at the beginning stated. The difference being that netori is from the perspective of the guy doing the stealing.

Netorare is cuckoldry, when you are supposed to empathize with the guy allowing (and the key is the story being about him allowing it) his girlfriend to cheat, often because he also gets off to it.

Netori is just infidelity and you are supposed to empathize with the guy doing the stealing as a power fantasy. If the boyfriend dislikes or is not even aware of it, the boyfriend is not a cuckold.

Me, I am fine with anything because this is fiction. Much like how (most of) you do not really want to see New York being invaded and suffer massive casualties, but still paid to see The Avengers.
